item.title: ICXCAC (again!) – beasts from the South-East
item.author: Jack McKeon,
item.description: On Wednesday 7th March, 18 ICXCAC athletes embarked on a journey to running mecca – Iffley Road track in Oxford. It was on this hallowed turf in 1954 that the late Sir Roger Bannister broke the four-minute mile for the first time, and where the Imperial athletes would take part in the 2018 Teddy …

item.title: Netflix and Hill
item.author: Jack McKeon,
item.description: On Wednesday 24th January, it was LSE’s turn to host the 4th (and penultimate) LUCA XC race of the year at Alexandra Palace. Leaving a rainy Beit at 1pm, 30+ dishevelled Imperial students took the Piccadilly line to Wood Green before ascending the long hill up to the café at Ally Pally. Their …
